data.title: Detailed information for Intuit Canada
data.text:
Product name: ProFile T1

Certified for the 2023 tax year: Yes

Certified for prior years 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021 and 2022: Yes

Address: 8 Spadina Avenue, Suite 1900, Toronto, ON, M5V 0S8

Email: pas_support@intuit.com

Telephone: 1-800-452-9970

Exclusions for the 2023 tax year.

Electronic transmission of Form T217 Election, or Revocation of an Election, to use the Mark-to-Market method

Exclusions for the 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021, and 2022 tax years.

No exclusions

*Disclaimer

Please note that this information was provided by the software developer. If you find any discrepancies in the information provided, please contact the software developer directly. The links are provided for your convenience and are to be used at your own discretion.

Product name: Quickbooks Online Accountant Pro Tax

Certified for the 2023 tax year: Yes

Certified for prior years 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021 and 2022: Yes

Address: 8 Spadina Avenue, Suite 1900, Toronto, ON, M5V 0S8

Email: pas_support@intuit.com

Telephone: 1-800-452-9970

Exlcusion for the 2023 tax year.

Pre-authorized debits (PAD)

Electronic transmission of Form T217 Election, or Revocation of an Election, to use the Mark-to-Market method

Electronic transmission of Form T2057 Election on Disposition of Property by a Taxpayer to a Taxable Canadian Corporation

Electronic transmission of Form T2059 Election on Disposition of Property by a Taxpayer to a Canadian Partnership

Electronic transmission of Form UHT-2900 - Underused Housing Tax Return and Election Form

Exlcusion for the 2022 tax year.

Pre-authorized debits (PAD)

Exlcusions for the 2021 tax year.

Pre-authorized debits (PAD)

Form T1134, Information Return Relating to Controlled and Non-Controlled Foreign Affiliates

Exclusion for the 2020 tax year.

Pre-authorized debits (PAD)

Exclusions for the 2019 tax year.

T1 Condensed and Barcode

Pre-authorized debits (PAD)

Details of capital loss, non-capital loss and capital gain through Auto-fill my return

Exclusions for the 2018 tax year.

T1 Condensed and Barcode

Pre-authorized debits (PAD)

T1135, Foreign Income Verification Statement

Bankruptcy returns

Form T1273, Statement A - Harmonized AgriStability and AgriInvest Programs Information and Statement of Farming Activities for Individuals

Form T1274, Statement B - Harmonized AgriStability and AgriInvest Programs Information and Statement of Farming Activities for Additional Farming Operations

Form T1163, Statement A - AgriStability and AgriInvest Programs Information and Statement of Farming Activities for Individuals

Form T1164, Statement B - AgriStability and AgriInvest Programs Information and Statement of Farming Activities for Additional Farming Operations

NOTE: This software does not support the calculation/production of the T1 Provincial Québec return. For the list of software authorized by Revenu Québec for use by professional tax preparers in filing the personal income tax return TP-1, please visit the Revenu Québec website.

*Disclaimer

Please note that this information was provided by the software developer. If you find any discrepancies in the information provided, please contact the software developer directly. The links are provided for your convenience and are to be used at your own discretion.
